name: No Match For A Sith
Lore: 'Lightsaber duels are so fast and furious that Jedi don''t plan their offensive strategy, but instead rely on instinct and their ability to sense an opponent''s next strike.',
Text: 'If Maul armed with a lightsaber in battle, use 2 Force to draw two destiny. Opponent draws two destiny. If any of your destinies equal any of opponent''s destinies, opponent''s Jedi is power = 0 for remainder of battle.',
